projects.name: Mew's Tavern
projects.info: Fullstack app built with React.js and Django REST.
projects.description: Fullstack social media inspired app for the Pokémon fans. Features user registration, content sharing, liking, commenting and a PokéDex users can browse and interact with. Created with Django REST, PostgresQL and React.

projects.name: CreativeSpark
projects.description: Fullstack site where users can register, participate in drawing challenges and share the results with the community. Created with Django and PostgresQL.

projects.name: Word Shuffle
projects.description: JavaScript word game where user can choose between difficulties or categories, then try to unshuffle the words.

projects.name: Grimwood
projects.description: Old school text-based adventure command line game created with Python.

projects.name: Rabbithole
projects.description: Website for a fictional indie-game publishing company. Created with HTML5 and CSS3.
